title: GraphiQL
name: Name
promo: This application is your go-to tool for interacting with RESTful and GraphQL APIs. Whether you're a developer, tester, or just someone who loves to explore APIs, this client is designed to meet your needs with a user-friendly interface and powerful features.
restClientPlus1: Easily interact with any RESTful API.
restClientPlus2: Select HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.).
restClientPlus3: Edit and manage headers, request body, and view responses in real-time.
graphiqlClientPlus3: Manage variables and headers, and explore the documentation (SDL) with ease.
errNameLettersAndNumbers: Name must contain only Latin letters and numbers
errNameMinLength: Name must be at least 3 characters long
errEmailFormat: The email must contain the '@' and the domain name
errPasswordCapitalLetter: The password must contain one capital letter
errPasswordLowercaseLetter: The password must contain one lowercase letter
errPasswordOneDigit: The password must contain one digit
errPasswordSpecialSymbol: The password must contain one special symbol
errPasswordMinLength: The password must be at least 8 characters
